text: (viśvāsavantayinṭa) ovun “oba yudevvan nætahot kristiyānuvan bavaṭa pat vanu. (eviṭa oba) ṛju mārgaya at kara ganu labannehuya” yayi pavasannāha. (eyaṭa) “esē nova, ṛju mārgayaṭa ayat ibrāhīmgē dharmayama (anugamanaya karannemu). ohu (oba men) samānayan tabā næmadū ayeku nova” yayi (pavasana men viśvāsavantayinṭa nabiyē!) oba pavasanu (mænava)
